commit.message:
re PR c++/19532 (cp/pt.c mentions a function that has been removed.)

2007-08-06  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>

	PR c++/19532
	* pt.c (template_class_depth): Fix comment; change return type
	to bool.

From-SVN: r127238
